Nice product but wife did not like.

Fit so well. Such nice feel in material. I hope it washes up just as nice.

I love this sweatshirt! It is extremely comfy. I get compliments every time I wear it. The green color is beautiful! It does run big, but I like that because I can comfortably wear it with leggings and not worry about not being covered. The only reason this is not getting five stars is because the material snags easily.
This sweatshirt is soft, runs true to size, and looks amazing on. Mid weight. Probably 50-60 degree weather. I would buy 10  more, a great sweatshirt !

I loved this until I washed it. The entire inside is coming apart and when I put it on, my arms and hands get caught in the pilling that is coming apart. Very disappointed. I almost ordered more, glad I didn’t.
only washed this 1x & after taking out of wash, it was all “pilled” up (those small little fabric balls)….
Very comfortable lined sweat shirt  .
My wife purchased this for an upcoming trip. She said it is very comfortable, warm and thick. It looks stylish on her for a sweatshirt. Good value for the money.
Made small!  Waisted was super small and tight!  Not comfortable!

The outside of the hoodie is soft and the color is brilliant, but once you put your hands in the pocket it is a different story. The inside of the pocket is still soft but when you bring your hands out of the pocket, they have unexplainable cobwebby, stretchy thread on them. I thought it was because the shirt was new and it would stop after a couple of washes. No such luck. When I wore it, I would have threads coming out all over the place.
Not really crazy about. My hair strands get stuck inside and does not come out easily.
Delivered next day (before daylight!), size perfect. Prettier than what pic shows. Price awesome. Ordering another in different color.
Love the Hoodie. Fits well, very soft fabric. Bought one for my daughter in law, too.

I didn’t like it at first.  I put a striped crew neck shirt under and unzipped a little giving it a contrasting color- LOVING THE LOOK!!! Nice material, soft and warm.  Does not shrink, and size is spot on!  A keeper for sure!!

I love the size of this, perfectly over-sized in that super cozy sort of way but I don't feel like I'm drowning in it. My only knock is that I wish the inside was a bit softer. Still really like it though.

Sweat shirt pretty true to size! Material is super soft! Love the waffle look. Washed up great!
Cute hoodie.  Size was great, but the fabric looked worn...like it had been washed with weird detergent and it ruined it.

Fits true to size. You should know the waist band is snug and does not give so it's a bit on the tight side. The inside material is a bot scratchy. I will wear this occasionally but I will not be ordering it in additional colors as I normally do when I find a winner.
The fit was perfect,  well made, oversized but not huge, very soft and comfy. The fabric is not too thick so great for chilly weather.

As I said, I love this hoodie, but I hate our weather. It hasn’t been near cold enough to wear it. It’s the end of December and I have windows open. It’s crazy. Hopefully, in January I can wear it. So cute, made so well.

Different pattern than a normal hoodie but just as thick. Gave a comfy casual outfit a cute addition.

Perfect fit, warm and comfortable. Love it!

评论概述: Love the look, but snags easily

My dog jumped on me and her nail caught it and the shirt did show a small snag, but still love this top and would recommend.
Love this. Warm, well made and stylish. I got many compliments on it.
Uncomfortable and falls apart after one wash

I’m disappointed in this hoodie. Looks really cute in the model, but isn’t as cute in person. I don’t like the material. I’ve worn mine once and washed it once, and the material is already peeling. So it is now just a “at home” sweater. The fit is bulky and the inside lining feels cheap. I definitely overpaid for this hoodie, and would return it if I could. Size down if you do end up buying it.
